attributes.action: Reform the UK Visitor Visa application process in the name of fairness
attributes.background: The UK Visitor Visa application process is a minefield of bureaucracy and outright discrimination against poor applicants from certain countries. It is designed to reject as many applicants as possible whilst extorting huge sums of money from often vulnerable people.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.  
You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to make specific reforms or changes to the visitor visa application process.
